backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing access‑controlled user profiles, public customer registration with document blobs, and OTP generation/verification plus admin‑only registration queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two splash‑screen styling changes with their affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short functional summaries for build/reference use.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH theme variables plus base styles for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Orbitron font and mounting the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root managing splash‑screen gating and switching between registration and admin views.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen showing stylized multicolor company name with auto‑dismiss and skip options.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Full admin panel handling authentication, admin role checks, setup‑code flow, and viewing registrations.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: UI card allowing users to enter an admin setup code with states for applying, success, and error handling.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: Provides React Query hooks to check admin status, fetch roles, claim admin access, and retrieve registrations.
Mutation hook to apply an admin setup code, initialize admin access, and refresh admin-related queries.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Defines mutations to generate and verify OTP and submit registration data including document uploads.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Manages multi-step customer registration flow with navigation, progress, and step validation.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Form step for collecting customer details with validation and change tracking.
Handles OTP generation, verification, and triggers final registration submission with success state.
Renders the terms and conditions scroll area with an agreement checkbox and reports acceptance with a timestamp.
Handles Aadhaar and PAN file uploads with validation, previews, and change/remove actions, reporting validity to the parent step.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Exports structured terms and conditions sections for router and service policies.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Defines TypeScript interfaces for customer details, document data, and step props used in the registration flow.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates customer details fields including required values, phone format, age, email, and address length.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables, dark theme values, and splash screen animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, containers, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, features, and architectural notes for the registration app.
